item.title: Turn Your KDE to XP Style
item.description: KDE is a beautiful and highly customizable desktop environment, so can we turn it to Windows XP style? Themes Yes, you’re right. I do nearly all of these with the help of themes created by KDE community. I’ve picked out some of them which is similar to Windows XP. How to install themes: Open System system settings and choose Appearance Navigate to section you want Here you can install themes from local files or download them through a dialog Global theme Expose
